Uses of Package
com.stockticker.persistence

  • Packages that use com.stockticker.persistence 
    Package Description
    com.stockticker.persistence  
  • Classes in com.stockticker.persistence used by com.stockticker.persistence 
    Class and Description
    PersistenceConnection
    Defines the public interface for creating and accessing a JDBC database connection.
    PersistenceConnectionImpl
    Creates and initializing the H2 database and provides JDBC connections.
    PersistenceService
    Provides public interface methods for the Persistence Service component.
    PersistenceServiceException
    Exception handler for the Persistence Service.
    StockTickerPersistence
    Provides services to query and update User and Stock data in the database
    TrackedStocksDAO
    Interface that defines the Data Access methods that enables users to track stocks of interest.
    UserDAO
    Provides the interface for User related database actions
